text: The Turkish Football Federation (; TFF) is the governing body of football in Turkey. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded on 23 April 1923. It joined FIFA in the same year. The TFF also became a member of UEFA in 1962. title: Turkish Football Federation
